structure.unit: Inspection And Regulation Of, And Licenses For, Buildings, Elevators And Cinematographs

law.catch_line: Machines To Which Cinematograph Statutes Are Not Applicable; Regulations
law.text: Sections seventy-two to seventy-five, inclusive, shall not apply to any motion picture machine operated with only cellulose acetate film less than thirty-five millimeters and requiring not more than five hundred watts of electrical current to operate the arc or lamp.
